Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System Cephalothin (1-64 μg/mL)
BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent Cephalothin (1-64 μg/mL) Gram-negative ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Isolates from pure culture of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Isolates from pure culture of Gram-positive bacteria belonging to Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, and Streptococcus
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System with Cephalothin panels for quantitative antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacterial isolates
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) of most Gram-negative and Gram-positive aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria isolates from pure culture, including additional Gram-negative organism groups with Cephalothin panels
